```{r}
restaurants_by_cuisine <- read.csv("C:/Users/Carlo/Desktop/EDAV Project/number of restaurants by cuisine.csv")
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

r_by_city <- restaurants_by_cuisine %>% group_by(city, state) %>%
                    summarize(number= sum(NumberOfRestaurants)) %>%
                    filter(number > 100)

View(r_by_city)
```
